name: AUDIOGRAM_TECHNIQUES
description: Contains the values selected for techniques used when performing Audiogram exams.

columns.name: FINDING_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (ID number) for the finding record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: AUDIO_TECHNIQUE_C_NAME
columns.description: The technique(s) used for the Audiogram.
